languages.text: "Прошу приобщить к протоколу этого разговора малую декларацию сомнения в целесообразности директивы", {n}— Паскаль звучит недовольным, но сдерживает эмоции.{/n}
"I ask that the protocol of this conversation include a minor declaration of doubt in regards to the soundness of this directive." {n}Pasqal sounds displeased but holds his temper.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Прошу приобщить к протоколу этого разговора малую декларацию сомнения в целесообразности директивы", {n}— Паскаль звучит недовольным, но сдерживает эмоции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Let me ask you to include a minor declaration of a doubt in the reasonability of the directive to the protocol of this conversation." {n}Pasqal sounds upset, although trying to control his emotions.{/n}

"Let me ask you to include a minor declaration of a doubt in the reasonability of the directive to the protocol of this conversation." {n}Pasqal sounds upset, although trying to control his emotions.{/n}

"I ask that the protocol of this conversation includes a minor declaration of doubt in regards to the feasibility of this directive." {n}Pasqal sounds irritated, but his emotions are still under control.{/n}

"I ask that the protocol of this conversation includes a minor declaration of doubt in regards to the feasibility of this directive." {n}Pasqal sounds irritated, but his emotions are still under control.{/n}
"I ask that the protocol of this conversation include a minor declaration of doubt in regards to the soundness of this directive." {n}Pasqal sounds displeased but holds his temper.{/n}

languages.text: “我要求进行谈话协议，请允许我对这个决定的正确性提出轻微怀疑。”{n}帕斯卡听起来不太满意，但依然压抑着自己的恼怒。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I ask that the protocol of this conversation include a minor declaration of doubt in regards to the soundness of this directive." {n}Pasqal sounds displeased but holds his temper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我要求进行谈话协议，请允许我对这个决定的正确性提出轻微怀疑。”{n}帕斯卡听起来不太满意，但依然压抑着自己的恼怒。{/n}

languages.text: « J'inscris au protocole de cette conversation une demande de déclaration mineure de doute quant au bien-fondé de cette directive. » {n}Pasqal semble contrarié, mais il prend sur lui pour n'en rien laisser paraître.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I ask that the protocol of this conversation include a minor declaration of doubt in regards to the soundness of this directive." {n}Pasqal sounds displeased but holds his temper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'inscris au protocole de cette conversation une demande de déclaration mineure de doute quant au bien-fondé de cette directive. » {n}Pasqal semble contrarié, mais il prend sur lui pour n'en rien laisser paraître.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich bitte darum, dass im Protokoll dieser Unterhaltung vermerkt wird, dass ich Zweifel bezüglich der Sinnhaftigkeit dieser Direktive hege." {n}Pasqal klingt verärgert, bewahrt jedoch die Fassung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I ask that the protocol of this conversation include a minor declaration of doubt in regards to the soundness of this directive." {n}Pasqal sounds displeased but holds his temper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte darum, dass im Protokoll dieser Unterhaltung vermerkt wird, dass ich Zweifel bezüglich der Sinnhaftigkeit dieser Direktive hege." {n}Pasqal klingt verärgert, bewahrt jedoch die Fassung.{/n}

languages.text: «Solicito que el protocolo de esta conversación incluya una breve declaración de duda respecto a la lógica de esta directiva». {n}Pasqal parece insatisfecho, pero logra controlar su temperamento.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I ask that the protocol of this conversation include a minor declaration of doubt in regards to the soundness of this directive." {n}Pasqal sounds displeased but holds his temper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Solicito que el protocolo de esta conversación incluya una breve declaración de duda respecto a la lógica de esta directiva». {n}Pasqal parece insatisfecho, pero logra controlar su temperamento.{/n}

languages.text: 「この会話のプロトコルに、この指令の実現可能性に関して若干の疑念を表明することも含めていただきたい」{n}パスカルは苛立っているような話しぶりだが、彼の感情はまだ抑えられている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I ask that the protocol of this conversation include a minor declaration of doubt in regards to the soundness of this directive." {n}Pasqal sounds displeased but holds his temper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この会話のプロトコルに、この指令の実現可能性に関して若干の疑念を表明することも含めていただきたい」{n}パスカルは苛立っているような話しぶりだが、彼の感情はまだ抑えられている。{/n}

languages.text: "Bu konuşmanın tutanağına az evvel verilen emrin akla yatkınlığına ilişkin şüphelerim olduğuna dair ufak bir ekleme yapılmasını rica ederim." {n}Öfkesine hâkim olsa da Pasqal'ın memnuniyetsizliği, sesinden anlaşılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I ask that the protocol of this conversation include a minor declaration of doubt in regards to the soundness of this directive." {n}Pasqal sounds displeased but holds his temper.{/n}
